thing-type.label: POPE700397 Popp Smart Outdoor Plug - IP44 rated
thing-type.description: Popp Smart Outdoor Plug - IP44 rated<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Wall Plug Switch Outdoor can be placed between a wall outlet for plugs type F and electric devices, plugged in by a cord. It can switch all loads up to 3500 W. The plug switch is IP 44 rated and can, therefore, be used both in dry as well as humid environments in- and outdoor.</p&gt <p&gtSwitching is controlled by the local button or wirelessly. The use of the local button and the behavior on wireless commands can be configured using configuration parameters. When detached from the control of local leads the button on the device can be used to trigger scenes in a central gateway. A single click and double click are distinguished.</p&gt <p&gtThe device is also measuring the mains voltage supply reporting mains voltage and mains frequency. Additionally, the power consumption of the attached load is monitored as well.</p&gt <p&gtAll metering values can be requested from the central controller and will be reported unsolicited if configured. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTripple Click the button for inclusion. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTripple Click the button for exclusion.</p&gt

parameter.description: This parameter defines if the local button ...<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis parameter defines if the local button shall control (switch) the load or it is only used to send out scene control commands to the central controller.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Status after Power Failure
parameter.description: Status after Power Failure<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines the switching status after a power failure or unplugging</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_21_1
parameter.label: 21: LED Color on OFF state
parameter.description: LED Color on OFF state<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines the behavior of the LED when the load is switched off</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_22_1
parameter.label: 22: LED Color on ON state
parameter.description: LED Color on ON state<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines the behavior of the LED when the load is switched on</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_23_1
parameter.label: 23: Voltage Report Threshold
parameter.description: Voltage Report Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtReport the voltage when the voltage has changed by more then X * 1 V. When disabled (Value 0) the device will report every 10 minutes regardless of current voltage.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_24_1
parameter.label: 24: Current Reporting Threshold
parameter.description: Current Reporting Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtReport the current when the current has changed by more then X *0,01 A. When disabled the device will report every 10 minutes regardless of current change.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_25_1
parameter.label: 25: Power Reporting Threshold
parameter.description: Power Reporting Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtReport the power when the power has changed by more then X Watt. When disabled (Value 0) the device will report every 10 minutes regardless of power consumption change.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_26_2
parameter.label: 26: Soft Circuit Breaker Threshold
parameter.description: Soft Circuit Breaker Threshold<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen the power draw exceeds the value set in this parameter (x W) for a time set in parameter 28 the soft ciruit breaker will disconnect the load.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_27_1
parameter.label: 27: Soft Circuit Breaker Recovery Time
parameter.description: Soft Circuit Breaker Recovery Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtOnce the soft circuit breaker tipps and the load is disconnected the load will be automatically reconneced after X seconds. When disabled (value 0) the load must be repowered manually or with wireless command.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_28_1
parameter.label: 28: Soft Circuit Breaker Delay Time
parameter.description: Soft Circuit Breaker Delay Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis delay time (x * 0,1s) defines how fast the soft circuit breaker wil react when the threshold power is exceeded. The power is cut off only if the power draw remains over the threshold level for the defines time.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Control other devices
parameter.description: Control other devices on single click of the button. BASIC command (on/off) is sent according to switching state of the load.
